mapper.insert: INSERT INTO plan(planNo, planTitle, planContent, mem_id) VALUES (plan_seq.NEXTVAL, #{planTitle},#{planContent},#{mem_Id})
mapper.select: select * from plan where planNo = (select max(planNo) from plan)

SELECT * FROM (SELECT LOCATION_NUM,THEMA_CATEGORY,LOCATION_NAME,LOCATION_ADDR,LOCATION_IMG1,LOCATION_IMG2, LOCATION_IMG3,LOCATION_IMG4,DETAIL_INFO,X_COORDINATE,Y_COORDINATE,LOCATION_WEB,LIKE_SCORE, OPEN_TIME,CLOSE_TIME,AREA, NORMAL_SCORE,BAD_SCORE FROM (SELECT * FROM TRIP_LOCATION_INFO ORDER BY like_score desc)) WHERE AREA = #{area} or AREA;
SELECT * FROM TRIP_LOCATION_INFO WHERE area=#{area} ORDER BY LOCATION_NAME

select * from (select c.planNo, c.location_num, c.planOrder, c.dday, c.plan_courseNo, p.planTitle, t.location_name FROM plan_course c, plan p, TRIP_LOCATION_INFO t where C.planNo = p.planNo and t.location_num = c.location_Num and p.planNo = #{planNo} order by dday,plan_courseNo)
select count(*) from plan where mem_id = #{mem_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE plan SET planTitle=#{planTitle}, planContent=#{planContent} where planNo = #{planNo}
